main event: A civilian observed one round object shaped like a star, emitting variable red, orange, and green colors in Glendive, Montana on July 25, 1955.
interesting points: The object maneuvered both vertically and horizontally from its original point of sighting., The sighting lasted for 1 hour and 10 minutes., The object descended at the end of the sighting and appeared to land., Venus, Mars, Jupiter, and Saturn were out at the time, but the object was concluded to be Arcturus., An investigation was authorized for this case, indicating potential official interest.
sighted object: one round object shaped like a star
witness description: a house painter and a housewife
